post.text: FBI Director Comey owes the American people an explanation. Five things you need to know:

comment.author: Amber
comment.text: Ask yourself, if you were hiring someone for your business. Would you hire someone who has spent half her adult life under scrutiny and intense investigation? Someone who has lied to you and stolen paperwork from her last job!!! I don't think so!!!!!

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: Yes,and all witch hunts led by ur republicans always lead to nothing .

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: You're another terrified ignorant woman and unaccomplished I'm sure! You're not good enough to do Hillarys laundry!

replies.author: Amber
replies.text: Kyle gosh and a clairvoyant too! She'll have time to do her own laundry real soon!!

replies.author: Thomas
replies.text: Hillary Clinton is nothing more than a worthless politician. She should have been removed from the ballot early on.
